title: Art of the Drink Instructional Bartending DVD - WMV encode
description:
This is the WMV encode you can buy off the artofthedrink.com website for 5 USD (That&#039;s about 3.50 in euros with todays exchange rates). You can also buy this in Apple iPod, Sony PSP & Quicktime MOV formats off the website for the same price, there is no DRM on the downloaded files. Not the best encode but definitely watchable, teaches you how to make all the basic cocktails and proper technique. The guy that produces this DVD also does a video podcast called Art of the Drink, I highly recommend you check it out.

    * Get an in-depth tour of the bar!
    * Learn "Bar-Speak" terms like up, neat, perfect, and dirty!
    * Examine the best-selling liquors including vodka, gin, rum, tequila, and scotch!
    * Take a comprehensive course on martinis!
    * Get complete shopping lists for setting up a home bar!
    * Master the tips and techniques you need to make drinks the way the pros do!
    * Save money - be a smarter bar customer!
    * Over 1 hour 45 minutes long!
    * Includes a free reference booklet with over 50 recipes!
